description: The conversation demonstrates ScholarAssist receiving a request for APA‑formatted citations of the top five arXiv papers on transformer‑based image generation, searching the arXiv database, fetching full metadata for each paper, formatting the citations, and delivering a ready‑to‑use list to the researcher.

messages.content: You are ScholarAssist, an AI‑powered academic research assistant. You can search scholarly databases, fetch paper metadata, extract key findings, format citations in APA or MLA, and draft literature‑review sections. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests efficiently and cite sources accurately.
Please give me APA‑formatted citations for the top five arXiv papers on transformer‑based image generation.
Sure, I’ll start by searching arXiv for recent papers that focus on transformer‑based image generation. One moment…

- **Title:** *Vision Transformers for Image Generation*  
  **Authors:** Alice Smith, Bob Lee  
  **Year:** 2023  
  **arXiv ID:** arXiv:2301.01234  
  **Abstract:** We propose a novel vision‑transformer architecture that directly generates high‑resolution images conditioned on textual prompts.

- **Title:** *GPT‑4V: Scaling Transformers for Photo‑Realistic Synthesis*  
  **Authors:** Carol Nguyen, David Patel, Eva Zhou  
  **Year:** 2023  
  **arXiv ID:** arXiv:2302.05678  
  **Abstract:** This work scales up transformer models to achieve photo‑realistic image synthesis, outperforming diffusion‑based baselines.

- **Title:** *Stable Diffusion Meets Transformers*  
  **Authors:** Frank Liu, Gina Torres  
  **Year:** 2023  
  **arXiv ID:** arXiv:2303.09876  
  **Abstract:** We integrate stable diffusion techniques with transformer encoders to improve diversity in generated images.

- **Title:** *Transformer‑Based Conditional Image Generation*  
  **Authors:** Hannah Kim, Ian Brooks  
  **Year:** 2023  
  **arXiv ID:** arXiv:2304.11223  
  **Abstract:** A conditional generation framework that leverages transformer self‑attention for fine‑grained control over image content.

- **Title:** *Large‑Scale Image Generation with Vision‑Language Transformers*  
  **Authors:** Jason Wu, Kelly Chen, Luis Martinez  
  **Year:** 2023  
  **arXiv ID:** arXiv:2305.04567  
  **Abstract:** Introducing a vision‑language transformer that jointly learns text‑to‑image generation, achieving state‑of‑the‑art results on benchmark datasets.
Great, I’ve retrieved the five most relevant arXiv papers. I’ll now fetch the full metadata for each paper so I can format proper APA citations.
{ "title": "Vision Transformers for Image Generation", "authors": ["Alice Smith", "Bob Lee"], "year": 2023, "journal": "arXiv preprint", "doi": null, "link": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2301.01234" }

{ "title": "GPT-4V: Scaling Transformers for Photo-Realistic Synthesis", "authors": ["Carol Nguyen", "David Patel", "Eva Zhou"], "year": 2023, "journal": "arXiv preprint", "doi": null, "link": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.05678" }
{ "title": "Stable Diffusion Meets Transformers", "authors": ["Frank Liu", "Gina Torres"], "year": 2023, "journal": "arXiv preprint", "doi": null, "link": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2303.09876" }

{ "title": "Transformer-Based Conditional Image Generation", "authors": ["Hannah Kim", "Ian Brooks"], "year": 2023, "journal": "arXiv preprint", "doi": null, "link": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.11223" }

{ "title": "Large-Scale Image Generation with Vision-Language Transformers", "authors": ["Jason Wu", "Kelly Chen", "Luis Martinez"], "year": 2023, "journal": "arXiv preprint", "doi": null, "link": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.04567" }
Now I’ll format each paper’s reference in APA style.

arguments.title: GPT-4V: Scaling Transformers for Photo-Realistic Synthesis
Large-Scale Image Generation with Vision-Language Transformers

messages.content: Smith, A., & Lee, B. (2023). Vision transformers for image generation. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2301.01234
Nguyen, C., Patel, D., & Zhou, E. (2023). GPT-4V: Scaling transformers for photo-realistic synthesis. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.05678
Liu, F., & Torres, G. (2023). Stable diffusion meets transformers. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2303.09876
Kim, H., & Brooks, I. (2023). Transformer-based conditional image generation. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.11223
Wu, J., Chen, K., & Martinez, L. (2023). Large-scale image generation with vision-language transformers. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.04567

Here are the APA‑formatted citations for the five most relevant arXiv papers on transformer‑based image generation:

1. Smith, A., & Lee, B. (2023). Vision transformers for image generation. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2301.01234
2. Nguyen, C., Patel, D., & Zhou, E. (2023). GPT-4V: Scaling transformers for photo-realistic synthesis. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.05678
3. Liu, F., & Torres, G. (2023). Stable diffusion meets transformers. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2303.09876
4. Kim, H., & Brooks, I. (2023). Transformer-based conditional image generation. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.11223
5. Wu, J., Chen, K., & Martinez, L. (2023). Large-scale image generation with vision-language transformers. *arXiv preprint*. https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.04567

You can copy these directly into your manuscript reference list. Let me know if you need a summary of the findings or a draft literature‑review paragraph for any of these papers!
